nodes.text: Freedmar was a male merchant, who was also known by the nickname "Flex", and served the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. He wore red and gold colored armor, and worked selling equipment to other Imperial during the war. He worked in the supplies section on board the Vaiken Spacedock space station, which was located within the Imperial fleet.

Freedmar was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as an Imperial classic gear vendor within the Imperial fleet. He was later removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
